overview: This is a story that reflects the real life of a group of lonely elderly people in remote mountainous areas. It truly reflects a moving story of a group of lonely old people living in the depths of the mountains, caring for each other. The story revolves around the protagonist, Zhao Youtian, who learned that his son would take his grandson to visit him on weekends. He was delighted to learn that his grandson loves lamb skewers. Difficult choices.
title: The End of Autumn
